name: Andrélon Men shampoo hair en body
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-10, Disodium EDTA, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder (Aloë Vera), Maltodextrin, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-6, Limonene, Linalool, CI 42051.
